languages.text: "Потому что вы не хотите знать, какова цена этой ошибки. И какие формы она может принять".

traits.locale_text: "Потому что вы не хотите знать, какова цена этой ошибки. И какие формы она может принять".

languages.text: "Because you do not want to know the price of such an error. Or what forms it might take."
languages.original_text: "Потому что вы не хотите знать, какова цена этой ошибки. И какие формы она может принять".

traits.locale_text: "Because you don't want to know the price of such an error. Or what forms it might take."
"Because you don't want to know the price of such an error. Or what forms it might take."
"Because you do not want to know the price of such an error. Or what forms it might take."
"Because you do not want to know the price of such an error. Or what forms it might take."
"Because you do not want to know the price of such an error. Or what forms it might take."

languages.text: 「なぜなら、そのような誤りで生じる損失を知りたくないのだろう。あるいは、どのような形の損失になり得るのかを」
languages.original_text: "Because you do not want to know the price of such an error. Or what forms it might take."

traits.locale_text: 「なぜなら、そのような誤りで生じる損失を知りたくないのだろう。あるいは、どのような形の損失になり得るのかを」

languages.original_text: "Because you do not want to know the price of such an error. Or what forms it might take."

languages.text: “一旦犯下了微小的错误，会付出怎样的代价，或以什么方式付出代价，这个答案你是不会想知道的。”
languages.original_text: "Because you do not want to know the price of such an error. Or what forms it might take."

traits.locale_text: “一旦犯下了微小的错误，会付出怎样的代价，或以什么方式付出代价，这个答案你是不会想知道的。”

languages.text: «Porque no quiere conocer el precio de semejante error. Ni las formas que puede adoptar».
languages.original_text: "Because you do not want to know the price of such an error. Or what forms it might take."

traits.locale_text: «Porque no quiere conocer el precio de semejante error. Ni las formas que puede adoptar».

languages.text: « Parce que croyez-moi, vous ne voulez pas connaître le prix à payer si nous faisons la moindre erreur. Ou quelles en seraient les conséquences. »
languages.original_text: "Because you do not want to know the price of such an error. Or what forms it might take."

traits.locale_text: « Parce que croyez-moi, vous ne voulez pas connaître le prix à payer si nous faisons la moindre erreur. Ou quelles en seraient les conséquences. »

languages.text: "Und Ihr wollt den Preis eines solchen Fehlers gar nicht wissen. Oder welche Formen er annehmen könnte."
languages.original_text: "Because you do not want to know the price of such an error. Or what forms it might take."

traits.locale_text: "Und Ihr wollt den Preis eines solchen Fehlers gar nicht wissen. Oder welche Formen er annehmen könnte."

languages.text: "Zira yapılabilecek bir hatanın bedelinin ne olacağını veya nasıl bir biçim alacağını bilmek istemezsin."
languages.original_text: "Because you do not want to know the price of such an error. Or what forms it might take."

traits.locale_text: "O konuda yapılabilecek bir hatanın bedelinin ne olacağını veya nasıl bir biçim alacağını bilmek istemezsin."
